title: Saturn Transit in the 6th House for Leo Ascendant
summary: Saturn transiting the sixth house strengthens discipline around work, health, and obligations for Leo ascendants. Daily routines demand consistency, and challenges must be handled methodically. This phase favors perseverance over speed, helping you overcome competitors through steady effort. Health improves with structured habits, though neglect shows quickly. By embracing service, accountability, and patience, this transit builds practical strength and reliable problem-solving capacity.

sections.heading: Career
points: Favorable for service and operational roles

sections.heading: Finance
points: Expenses tied to health or routines

closing: This transit rewards diligence and responsibility. By mastering routines and service, you gain lasting strength and control.
